snippet: The art exhibition “Elevation 1049: Between Heaven and Hell” adds one more engaging distraction to Gstaad, which already has a fair share.
abstract: Elevation 1049: Between Heaven and Hell, site-specific group art exhibition, opens in postcard-perfect ski resort town of Gstaad, Switzerland; show, created by 25 Swiss artists, features installations that engage with the resort town landscape and address issues like climate change and income inequality.
lead_paragraph: The art exhibition “Elevation 1049: Between Heaven and Hell” adds one more engaging distraction to Gstaad, which already has a fair share.

headline.print_headline: Artists Go to Town on a Picturesque Swiss Village
headline.main: Art Reaches New Heights in Alps
